biography: Mikael, a golfer of considerable renown, hails from the esteemed Kurk Golf club. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Mikael's presence on the course is always marked by a quiet intensity and strategic brilliance.

While Mikael has graced the Hector Trophée on one occasion, his impact extends beyond mere participation. Though he is considered retired from future Hector Trophée events, his influence on the sport remains palpable. His admirers are legion.
Though the fairways may miss his calculated drives and thoughtful putts, Mikael's legacy as a true sportsman endures. Whether or not we will see Mikael again in future events remains to be seen.
